title: So Yasuo got a massive buff, Brand is still busted, and assassins are still obnoxious.
body:
Their solution? Nerf teleport.
Are they even trying?

replies.body: If we buff Brand and bring back pre-nerf DFT then maybe he will start having "busted" stats.

> [{quoted}](name=BUFF NIMBUSMAN,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=fmywMimQ,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-08-10T05:03:45.767+0000)

Yeah, because he isn't overpowered already, now is he?
That buff never went through, no word on brand yet and tanks are getting buffs soon. Calm down
People still making "OMG why has yasuo been buffed?!" posts.  It's been canceled, and many people have even made POSTS saying its been canceled.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicalDemons,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=fmywMimQ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-08-10T04:40:51.090+0000)
>
> People still making "OMG why has yasuo been buffed?!" posts.  It's been canceled, and many people have even made POSTS saying its been canceled.

Still, the fact that they were even considering it is well deserving of an alarm pull.
Seriously, they wonder why the players are pissed off. Gee, what a mystery Scooby.

> [{quoted}](name=afmghost,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=fmywMimQ,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-08-10T04:50:18.092+0000)
>
> Still, the fact that they were even considering it is well deserving of an alarm pull.
> Seriously, they wonder why the players are pissed off. Gee, what a mystery Scooby.

Naw, the only people "pissed off" are people who 

1. cant read about the updates being made
2.  looking for attention using a false platform

> [{quoted}](name=MagicalDemons,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=fmywMimQ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-08-10T04:40:51.090+0000)
>
> People still making "OMG why has yasuo been buffed?!" posts.  **It's been canceled**, and many people have even made POSTS saying its been canceled.

for now

It's on the PBE. This might be hard to understand but that means 

#they. are. test. ing. it.

It's uncertain if it will reach live servers.
